page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: EMPLOYMENT IN DUNSTABLE AND HOUGHTON REGIS Employment in Dunstable and Houghton Regis is vital,because they need the money and products from it.The figures for unemployment in Dunstable and Houghton Regis are issued in early July: 1985: 2,763 people unemployed,1,732 men and 1,031 women.The unemployment rate in Bedford is 10.2%. The two largest employers in Dunstable are Vauxhalls and AC Delco.These two firms are both concerned with automobile construction. In Houghton Regis the largest employers are Air Call,which is near Bedford Square. In the last 15 years economic conditions have caused higher unemployment. There are more government schemes to train the young people & full time vacancies have become less.
